topics.body:
I know it's dead horse by now, but I have to say the... argument about the NSFW tag was great. First, some people act retarded over change, then (my favorite part) some other people act retarded about the former people acting retarded, apparently thinking they are any better themselves. (Quasar sure was a riot). And the one person who didn't act retarded was mostly ignored.

That trainwreck was basically Derpibooru in its purest form. A great summation of its userbase. Add a comment, that one should never pay for art, and it would have been perfect.
topics.author: 5179b098a4c72d9b7f0028ee

I'm just thinking this is what a internet fight is like between _mature_ people.
